metadata.name: Frankenstein by Mary Shelley
metadata.description: Mary Wollstonecraftâ€™s novel, FRANKENSTEIN, tells the story of a scientist named Victor Frankenstein who creates a grotesque creature in an unorthodox scientific experiment. The creature struggles to fit into human society and seeks revenge against Frankenstein. This TokenBook edition features a visually stunning design with intricate chapter headings and custom endpapers. The book is an attractive and enduring digital heirloom that provides true ownership of the underlying digital work. Cryptoversal Books is committed to sustainability and innovation in Web3 publishing.
